task.Question: The attached Excel file contains the sales of menu items for a local fast-food chain. What were the total sales that the chain made from food (not including drinks)? Express your answer in USD with two decimal places.

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Read the columns representing different menu items. Note that they all appear to be food except for the “soda” column.
3. Write a function to sum the relevant columns.
4. Ensure the answer follows the specified formatting.

steps.content:
The attached Excel file contains the sales of menu items for a local fast-food chain. What were the total sales that the chain made from food (not including drinks)? Express your answer in USD with two decimal places.

XLSX document content:
## Sheet1
| Location | Burgers | Hot Dogs | Salads | Fries | Ice Cream | Soda |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Pinebrook | 1594 | 1999 | 2002 | 2005 | 1977 | 1980 |
| Wharvton | 1983 | 2008 | 2014 | 2015 | 2017 | 2018 |
| Sagrada | 2019 | 2022 | 2022 | 2023 | 2021 | 2019 |
| Algrimand | 1958 | 1971 | 1982 | 1989 | 1998 | 2009 |
| Marztep | 2015 | 2016 | 2018 | 2019 | 2021 | 2022 |
| San Cecelia | 2011 | 2010 | 2012 | 2013 | 2015 | 2016 |
| Pimento | 2017 | 1999 | 2001 | 2003 | 1969 | 2967 |
| Tinseles | 1967 | 1969 | 1982 | 1994 | 2005 | 2006 |
| Rosdale | 2007 | 2009 | 2021 | 1989 | 2005 | 2011 |

Path to the mentioned document: /tmp/7bd855d8-463d-4ed5-93ca-5fe35145f733.xlsx

plan: Load the Excel file from the specified path.
Access the first sheet of the Excel file to retrieve the sales data.
Identify the columns that represent food items: Burgers, Hot Dogs, Salads, Fries, and Ice Cream.
Sum the sales figures for each food item across all locations.
Format the total sales amount to two decimal places in USD.

given_facts: The Excel file contains sales data for menu items from a local fast-food chain.
The sales data includes the following food items: Burgers, Hot Dogs, Salads, Fries, Ice Cream.
The sales data is organized by location.
facts_to_derive: Total sales from food items (Burgers, Hot Dogs, Salads, Fries, Ice Cream) across all locations.

steps.reasoning:
To calculate the total sales from food items, I will sum the values of the columns: Burgers, Hot Dogs, Salads, Fries, and Ice Cream for all locations. The total sales can be computed as follows: 

Pinebrook: 1594 + 1999 + 2002 + 2005 + 1977 = 10577
Wharvton: 1983 + 2008 + 2014 + 2015 + 2017 = 10037
Sagrada: 2019 + 2022 + 2022 + 2023 + 2021 = 10107
Algrimand: 1958 + 1971 + 1982 + 1989 + 1998 = 9888
Marztep: 2015 + 2016 + 2018 + 2019 + 2021 = 10089
San Cecelia: 2011 + 2010 + 2012 + 2013 + 2015 = 10061
Pimento: 2017 + 1999 + 2001 + 2003 + 1969 = 10089
Tinseles: 1967 + 1969 + 1982 + 1994 + 2005 = 9917
Rosdale: 2007 + 2009 + 2021 + 1989 + 2005 = 10031

Adding these totals gives the overall total sales from food items.

steps.overview: Calculated total sales from food items in the fast-food chain.
